name: UserId
responsibilities: Act as an identifier for a concrete user
Compare two ids to check if they are equal
Determine the user who has a concrete id

name: User
responsibilities: Store generic information about an user (type and name)
Store a list of all users
Send messages to the correspondent user in the platform
Get the user which corresponds to a certain id

name: Message
responsibilities: Store the text of a message, as well as the sender's id
Determine which user sent the message

name: IState
responsibilities: Establishes the state of the user in the bot, which determines what to do when they send a message (the state after the message, as well as a message to respond to the user)

name: INotification
responsibilities: Represent information that an user wants to notify to another. For example, if an admin has to be notified that an enterprise they invited has registered successfully, that information is represented as an INotification

name: NotificationManager
responsibilities: Organize the sending of notifications between users

name: UserSession
responsibilities: Receive the messages from an user, modifying the user's current state and sending notifications to other users when it happens
Determine which session corresponds to a certain user

name: IMessageReceiver
responsibilities: Handle a message received from a concrete messaging platform

name: IMessageSender
responsibilities: Send a message created by the program through a concrete messaging platform

name: MessagingPlatform
responsibilities: Represent a messaging platform, through which the program can send and receive messages

name: MessageManager
responsibilities: Send each message to its corresponding UserSession
